actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to extend the term of design patent numbered 21053, dated September 22, 1891 for a badge, granted to George Brown Goode and assigned to the National Society, Daughters of the Revolution.

summary.text: Extends the term of design patent numbered 21053, dated September 22, 1891, for a badge, granted to George Brown Goode and assigned to the National Society, Daughters of the Revolution.

titles.title: A bill to extend the term of design patent numbered 21053, dated September 22, 1891 for a badge, granted to George Brown Goode and assigned to the National Society, Daughters of the Revolution.
